content: विक्षेपः {@--1@} Throwing away or asunder, scattering about. {@--2@} Casting, throwing, discharging (<ab>opp.</ab> संहार); <ls>R. 5. 45.</ls> {@--3@} Waving, moving about, shaking, moving to and fro; लांगूल° <ls>Ku. 1. 13.</ls> {@--4@} Sending, despatching. {@--5@} Distraction, confusion, perplexity; <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Alarm, fear. {@--7@} Refutation of an argument. {@--8@} Polar latitude. {@--9@} Looking about vaguely or wildly.
